title: Ticket #2774: SIGFPE in personal condor schedd
description:
I've been receiving reports of the schedd dying on signal 8 from one of the execute nodes in the new lab. (The schedd is part of the personal condor Metronome starts to run jobs.) It hasn't been happening very often; beginning November 14, and again on Nov 21, Nov 30, Dec 2, Dec 29, Jan 3, 10, 12, and 18, all on the same submit node, exec-6, which is x86_64_rhap_5.7.

A schedd died on signal 8 on exec-1 on Nov 14, 18, 25, Dec 3, 15, 20, 29, and Jan 7. The node exec-1 is x86_64_sl_6.0.

These are the only two machines I've seen with this error being reported, and the last twenty lines of their log all look like the following. 

  /lib64/libpthread.so.0[0x3b18a0eb70]
